DOC.brief_summary: Background : Taping use 20 year patellofemoral pain syndrome ( PFPS ) effectiveness still controversial . Purpose : This prospective study conduct investigate effect predictor effectiveness tap treat PFPS . Study design : Prospective cohort study Methods : One hundred consecutive patient diagnosis PFPS include study . Factors include sex , age , body mass index ( BMI ) , Q angle , lateral patella displacement ( LPD ) , lateral patellofemoral angle ( LPA ) pre-taping pain score measure . One well-trained therapist apply adhesive tape patient McConnell approach . Before tap , patient complete visual analog pain scale ( VAS ) perform step-down 8-inch platform . Paired-t test use difference VAS score measure tap . Patients improvement 1 point VAS score tap consider responsible , others non-responsible . The result analyze logistic regression .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Predictors Patella Taping Treatment Patellafemoral Pain Syndrome
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) age 20 60 year , ( 2 ) antero , retro , peripatellar pain least two follow : prolonged sitting , ascend descend stair , prolong walking , squatting , ( 3 ) insidious onset symptom unrelated traumatic incident . ( 1 ) symptom sign intrarticular derangement knee joint , effusion , ligament laxity , meniscal tear , ( 2 ) tenderness patella tendon , iliotibial band , pes anserinus tendon , ( 3 ) OsgoodSchlatter disease SindingLarsenJoahanssen syndromes , ( 4 ) referral pain hip lumbar region , ( 5 ) history patellar dislocation , previous knee surgery infection , ( 6 ) malignancy , ( 7 ) present pregnancy , ( 8 ) recent treatment PFPS , physiotherapy , nonsteroid antiinflammatory corticosteroid medication , ( 9 ) advance osteoarthritis knee joint .
